entry.title: Lavender & Rooibos Tea | Lavender in Lavender Hill (20 bags)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lavender in Lavender Hill
Type: Health Teas
Price: 56.00

Lavender in Lavender Hill's Lavender & Rooibos Tea (20 bags) are vegan-friendly and free of caffeine or other additives!

  • A delicious blend of lavender flowers and leaves, with traditional South African Rooibos
  • A warm cup of this Lavender & Rooibos Tea will help you wind down, de-stress and relax
  • Perfect before bedtime!
  • Full of antioxidants, as well as anti-inflammatory and soothing properties
  • Calms digestive discomfort, relieves constipation & indigestion
  • No artificial flavours or colourants, caffeine, preservatives or cruelty!
  • Teabags are packed in a foil pack which can be recycled
  • Vegan-friendly
  • Support this community upliftment project and help make the world a better place
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint

Ingredients 

Dried Lavender Flowers & Leaves, Rooibos Leaves

How to use

Steep a bag for 2-5 minutes before adding organic honey or milk.

entry.title: African Zumbani Balsamic Fever Tea - Manage Symptoms of Colds/Flu's
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Health Teas
Price: 109.50

Earth Tribe's Africa Fever Tea (75 g) is wild-harvested in Zimbabwe, bringing you a balsamic medicinal herbal tea traditionally used to manage colds and flu's, boasting a delicious, strong balsamic citrus-like scent.

  • Helps manage symptoms associated with colds/flu's: coughs, bronchial problems, fevers, headaches
  • Treats Dysentery and Diarrhea
  • Zumbani (Lemon Plant) has been used in Africa for generations for its analgesic, anti-inflammatory, anti-pyretic and anti-bacterial properties 
  • Zumbani is caffeine-free and contains a low percentage of tannins (less than Rooibos tea)

Ingredients

Lippia javanica (Zumbani)

Directions for use

One tablespoon per cup. Soak in boiling water for 5 minutes before draining.
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa
Herbal teas for colds and flu
